About Me

Ever since I was a child, I have enjoyed creating new worlds and letting others play inside of them. Whether with Lego blocks, computer-game-makers, or using JavaScript, I would give others insight into who I am through allowing them to explore my imagination. Now I am developing my coding skills in order to create those new worlds for everybody. As I work my way towards being a techno-psychologist, I seek to understand other people's minds by creating new ways for them to interact through modern technology. As far as I'm concerned, using virtual and augmented reality is just the beginning for ways to better understand human existance.

Dev Bootcamp Blog

As I work my way through Dev Bootcamp in order to become an experienced coder and website builder, I have been blogging about the cultural and technical lessons I've learned along the way. Some of these blogs act as tutorials on coding with various languages including ruby and JavaScript, while others talk about my personal struggles through life. If you enjoyed one of my blog posts, feel free to send me a tweet below!
